newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - PaineWebber ups Teradyne.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - PaineWebber ups Teradyne.

text.p: -- PaineWebber analyst Gunnar Miller said he upgraded Teradyne Inc to buy from attractive based on the stock's recent price weakness and optimism about the company's longer-term outlook.

-- The analyst brushed aside comments the company had made after the release of its fourth quarter earnings Tuesday that it expected orders in the first quarter to fall sequentially to $250 million from the fourth quarter's $303 million.
-- "We think the forward outlook is better," Miller said. "We are dealing with a timing issue."
-- He said he raised earnings estimates for the 1997 year to $1.45 per share from $1.00 previously and established a $2.45 per share estimate for 1998.
-- He said he boosted his share price target to $38 from the "low-$30s."
-- Teradyne shares had declined 1-1/2 points since Tuesday's earnings report. "We thought that was a good opportunity to get more aggresive on the stock," he said.
-- But Teradyne stock bounced back Thursday, trading up 1/5/8 on the day by mid-morning at 29-1/4.
